title.narrative: Technical Assistance to Facilitate and Coordinate the Humanitarian Response to the Syria Crisis

description.narrative: This activity (Technical Assistance to Facilitate and Coordinate the Humanitarian Response to the Syria Crisis) is a component of Syria Humanitarian Assistance, 2013 - 2016 reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Humanitarian assistance' and a budget of £1,000,000. This component benefits Middle East, regional, and works in the following sector(s): Relief co-ordination and support services. The start date is 01-07-2013 and the end date is 31-03-2015.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities - Social Affairs - Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities - emergency relief
